price: 49. Dheh: Ka keena Kitaab (kale) xagga Alle, oo ka hanuun wanaagsan labadooda aan raacee haddaad run sheegaysaan.
arabic: قُلۡ فَأۡتُواْ بِكِتَٰبٖ مِّنۡ عِندِ ٱللَّهِ هُوَ أَهۡدَىٰ مِنۡهُمَآ أَتَّبِعۡهُ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qul fatū bikitābin min ʿindi al-lahi huwa ahdā min'humā attabiʿ'hu in kuntum ṣādiqīna
